channel.title: Black Scape
channel.description: When BlackScape is on the ServerStatus list, it works fine. When it's not, it won't let me log on. Can anyone tell me when itll be back up? ANyone know how to fix it?

item.title: Black Scape
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

If you can’t log onto a server then it is down, try convincing the owner of the server to keep the server online. As for fixing it, none of us can because we can’t control what the owner of “BlackScape” does on their computer.

Read full topic
